encyclopedia.content: b-girl 1.b-girl就是指擅长跳breakin街舞的女孩子，相反，跳breakin的男生就叫b-boy 2.n. <美>酒吧女 B-girl B-girl n.（名词） A woman employed by a bar to encourage customers to spend money freely. 酒吧女郎，酒吧小姐：酒吧雇佣的刺激顾客放纵花钱的妇女 b(ar) 1 b(ar)1 girl girl B-girl B-girl n. A woman employed by a bar to encourage customers to spend money freely. b(ar) 1 girl
